name: REEA
description:
REEA is an award winning full digital interactive agency  with more than 15 years experience in working offline and onsite for worldwide clients.
With more than 240 specialists, which work full time in REEA we became one of the best one stop shop from Romania with office in Bern, Switzerland.
Services that we provide include branding, corporate design, UI/UX, prototyping,  product development, SEO/SEM,  web and mobile development, 2d/3d game design and development for web and mobiles, QA, server administration.
References about our work you can read on Linkedin profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/danmasca
